text: Hey, thought you might find some of this useful: <http://sunandmoonstudios.co.uk/animation-tips/faqs/>

attachments.title: FAQs - Sun & Moon studios
attachments.text: We get many emails from eager budding animators and film makers. It’s great to see passionate and often young people wanting to get into animation, however there isn’t always the time to email everyone back individually. We really wish we could! So here are a bunch of questions we frequently get asked. How can I... Read more »
attachments.fallback: Sun & Moon studios: FAQs - Sun & Moon studios
